casebody.data:
No. 11-88. Asid Mohamad, Individually and for the Estate of Azzam Rahim, Deceased, et al., Petitioners v. Palestinian Authority, et al. 565 U.S. 962, 132 S. Ct. 454,

181 L. Ed. 2d 292,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7581. October 17, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted, and case is to be argued in tandem with No. 10-1491, Kiobel, Individually and on Behalf of Her Late Husband Kiobel, et al. v. Royal Dutch Petroleum Co., et al., supra.

Same case below, 394 U.S. App. D.C. 277, 634 F.3d 604.
